document_data.name: Corsone
document_data.mainbody: '''Corsone''' was a member of the [[Shadow Druids]] who lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: The druid was not above using deceit and murder to achieve his goals.
document_data.Abilities: Like other Shadow Druids, he believed the best way to fight the encroachment of civilization was by might and force.
document_data.Relationships: Corsone was an associate of the [[Malarite]] druid [[Osmadi]], who maintained a shrine in the forest of [[Larswood]]. In fact, he saw his "friend" and his druidic allies as weak, believing them to stand in the way of the progress sought by the Shadow Druids.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Corsone [[poison]]ed Osmadi, causing him to go mad and slay his fellow druids. He concocted a story about how the group was attacked by [[bandit]]s.
